file_content.text: Nice! Now I know we hit the big time!
What makes you say that?
Explain.
You talking to me or yourself?
Sorry, I'm just so excited.
I'm trying to plot a course.
Keep it down.
Well hold off a sec, because you might want to change destinations.
Offers have been piling up since we won the Great Hunt, most not worth our time, but I think we finally struck the mother lode.
Some bigwig from Adascorp just sent us an offer with more zeros than I can count!
What's the job?
Details?
That's the best part. It's not a job.
Been thinking I don't get enough work in the private sector these days.
I like the sound of that.
Get this, it isn't even for a bounty.
Adascorp? Never heard of them.
Who are they?
Adasca BioMechanical--they're in partnership with the Draay Trust and Czerka Corporation. Big business.
They want you to endorse their new line of battlefield adrenals.
They're willing to give their current spokesperson the boot, but only if you pick up the contract as soon as possible.
I'm a professional hunter, not some celebrity mouthpiece.
I've a reputation to consider.
Well I am, and for that much money, I'd be glad to fill in for you.
Some dignity.
Don't care for it either.
Can't hurt to hear them out.
Plastering my face all over the holo's gonna do wonders for business.
Hey, free advertising.
Once wasn't enough for you?
Think I saw that. Next time show your good side, if you've got one.
Maybe we'll actually be able to start spending credits on something other than ammo.
They'll give 'em the boot, or I will.
Competition won't be an issue.
Only an idiot would argue with you there.
We're supposed to visit Adascorp's plant on Quesh to talk terms.
Let me handle the negotiations, and we'll be rolling in credits. I'll only take a thirty percent cut.
Not how I'd want to be remembered.
So, we headed to Quesh?
Tell Adascorp I'll take their offer under consideration.
I'll think about it.
Okay, but don't make me nag you. This is way too good an opportunity to miss because you forgot about it.
Plotting a course for Quesh now.
Let's not keep them waiting.
I'll let Adascorp know to expect us.
Never even heard of Quesh.
Where's Quesh?
Me either. Let me see what I can find.... It's a little toxic dump in the Outer Rim.
The only natural resource is a poison gas... which is apparently the main ingredient in adrenals. Didn't want to know that.
The HoloNet says the Empire and Republic are disputing whose territory Quesh is. Better be careful if we head there.
This is Torian. He'll be joining us, so get properly introduced.
Always room for one more in my book. I'm Mako.
Blizz friends call Blizz, Blizz. New friend can call Blizz Blizz too.
Gault Rennow, at your service.
Pleasure.
It's not much to look at, but it's home.
No complaints.
Get Torian settled. We're heading out.
Mako, find him a room.
Hey, remember what it looked like when we stole it?
I improved this ship a lot!
Got me there.
Good, I didn't want to hear any.
Not like you get a say.
Be nice, or I'll give you an earful.
Come on, I'll give you the tour.
It's probably better that Taris stay buried. There's been enough suffering there.
He's going to fit in just fine.
I think Torian wants to talk to you.
I hope that's the end of the family feuds.
I still can't believe we know those hunters personally.
Good of you to let him have his moment.
I guess there are things worse than being an orphan.
Do you feel old all of the sudden?
Quick! Get him before he disappears again!
I don't like leaving him like that. Let's make this count, okay?
We'd better hurry, I don't think Torian's going to be able to handle Jicoln all by himself.
I don't know how much more of this I can take.
I detect a trend here.
He's like a ghost.
I like it a lot better when we're chasing the other guy!
Poor Torian, makes me realize just how lucky I was to have Braden while I did.
Is that him?
There are like a million of these things!
Shh, please keep quiet. What if they hear us?
Are you sure this is a good idea?
Yuck... this is why I deal in computers.
When I get the smell of burning bodies out of my nose, then maybe we'll talk.
Those poor people. I hope they have the sense to run while they can.
Let's just get in and out without much of a stir, okay?
I've never seen so much... destruction. Even on Balmorra.
Taris... there's a lot of history buried here.
